title: A data-driven QSPR model for screening organic corrosion inhibitors for carbon steel using machine learning techniques
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11157-11168
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02159B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Thanh Hai Pham, Phung K. Le, Do Ngoc Son
An advanced machine learning workflow integrating the gradient boosting decision tree (GB) algorithm and the permutation feature importance (PFI) technique has been proposed to predict the corrosion inhibition efficiency (IE) of organic compounds.
